tutorial_content:
Welcome to Geozzle's tutorial! 
 
 This tutorial will guide you through the game's features. 
 
 Click 'Next' to continue.

The goal of the game is to gather clues and attempt to guess every country in the selected continent! 
 
 Remember, the more clues you use, the fewer points you'll earn!
On the welcome screen, you can select the continent you want to play in using the arrows on the sides of the screen.

Choose a hint from the three propositions presented. 
 
 Don't worry, you will be able to get a new hint if you don't know the answer.

Use all collected clues to guess the country by clicking 'I've found!'. 
 
 If you don't know the country, you can click 'New hint' to get a new one.

Choose the right country from the dropdown menu and click 'Validate'. 
 
 Click 'Back' to return to your clues.

If you're wrong, you can submit a new proposition or click 'Continue' to get a new hint. 

 You will loose a life for each wrong answer.

You are given 3 lives at the beginning of the game. 
 
 If you run out of lives, you can watch an ad to get a new one.
Don't worry, your lives will recharge on their own over time!
Go back to the home screen to see your newest highscore and percentage of guessed countries for each continent.
